author: Flywheel support@flywheel.io

save-json.description: use flag to save json containing model results.

description:
This gear wraps a model for classifying 20 body parts on x-ray images. These are: 
'Ankle', 'Calcaneus', 'Chest', 'Elbow', 'Femur', 'Fibula&Tibia', 'Finger', 'Foot',
'Hand', 'Head', 'Hip', 'Humerus', 'Knee', 'Mandible', 'Pelvis', 'Radius&Ulna',
'Shoulder&Shoulder', 'Spine', 'Cervical', 'Toes', 'Wrist'.

input-file.description: Input file for the gear can be Nifti, Dicom or PNG

label: X-ray Body Part Classifier
name: x-ray-body-part-classifier
